metadata.label: Declare Variable
metadata.description: Create a new variable

metadata.label: Expression
metadata.description: Initialize with value

metadata.label: Name
metadata.description: Name of the variable

metadata.label: Type
metadata.description: Type of the variable

metadata.label: If
metadata.description: Add conditional branch to the integration flow.

metadata.label: Condition
metadata.description: Boolean Condition

metadata.label: printError
Msg
metadata.description: The message to be logged

metadata.label: Error
metadata.description: The error struct to be logged

metadata.label: Stack Trace
metadata.description: The error stack trace to be logged

metadata.label: Additional Values
metadata.description: Capture key value pairs

metadata.label: Kafka Producer
metadata.description: Represents a Kafka producer endpoint.

metadata.label: Bootstrap Servers
metadata.description: List of remote server endpoints of Kafka brokers

metadata.label: Acks
metadata.description: Number of acknowledgments

metadata.label: Compression Type
metadata.description: Compression type to be used for messages

metadata.label: Client Id
metadata.description: Identifier to be used for server side logging

metadata.label: Metrics Recording Level
metadata.description: Metrics recording level

metadata.label: Metric Reporter Classes
metadata.description: Metrics reporter classes

metadata.label: Partitioner Class
metadata.description: Partitioner class to be used to select the partition to which the message is sent

metadata.label: Interceptor Classes
metadata.description: Interceptor classes to be used before sending the records

metadata.label: Transactional Id
metadata.description: Transactional ID to be used in transactional delivery

metadata.label: Schema Registry Url
metadata.description:
Avro schema registry URL. Use this field to specify the schema registry URL if the Avro
serializer is used

metadata.label: Avro Schema
metadata.description: The schema used for key/value serialization (Deprecated)

metadata.label: Key Schema
metadata.description: The schema used to serializate the key

metadata.label: Value Schema
metadata.description: The schema used to serialize the value

metadata.label: Schema Registry Config
metadata.description: Configurations to initialize a schema registry

metadata.label: Key Serializer Type
metadata.description: Key serialization type

metadata.label: Value Serializer Type
metadata.description: Value serialization type

metadata.label: Additional Properties
metadata.description:
Additional properties for the property fields not provided by the Ballerina `kafka` module. Use
this with caution since this can override any of the fields. It is not recomendded to use
this field except in an extreme situation

metadata.label: Buffer Memory
metadata.description: Total bytes of memory the producer can use to buffer records

metadata.label: Retry Count
metadata.description: Number of retries to resend a record

metadata.label: Batch Size
metadata.description:
Maximum number of bytes to be batched together when sending the records. Records exceeding this limit will
not be batched. Setting this to 0 will disable batching

metadata.label: Linger
metadata.description: Delay (in seconds) to allow other records to be batched before sending them to the Kafka server

metadata.label: Send Buffer
metadata.description: Size of the TCP send buffer (SO_SNDBUF)

metadata.label: Receive Buffer
metadata.description: Size of the TCP receive buffer (SO_RCVBUF)

metadata.label: Max Request Size
metadata.description: The maximum size of a request in bytes

metadata.label: Reconnect Backoff Time
metadata.description: Time (in seconds) to wait before attempting to reconnect

metadata.label: Reconnect Backoff Max Time
metadata.description: Maximum amount of time in seconds to wait when reconnecting

metadata.label: Retry Backoff Time
metadata.description: Time (in seconds) to wait before attempting to retry a failed request

metadata.label: Max Block
metadata.description: Maximum block time (in seconds) during which the sending is blocked when the buffer is full

metadata.label: Request Timeout
metadata.description: Wait time (in seconds) for the response of a request

metadata.label: Metadata Max Age
metadata.description: Maximum time (in seconds) to force a refresh of metadata

metadata.label: Metrics Sample Window
metadata.description: Time (in seconds) window for a metrics sample to compute over

metadata.label: Metrics Num Samples
metadata.description: Number of samples maintained to compute the metrics

metadata.label: Max In Flight Requests Per Connection
metadata.description: Maximum number of unacknowledged requests on a single connection

metadata.label: Connections Max Idle Time
metadata.description: Close the idle connections after this number of seconds

metadata.label: Transaction Timeout
metadata.description: Timeout (in seconds) for transaction status update from the producer

metadata.label: Enable Idempotence
metadata.description: Exactly one copy of each message is written to the stream when enabled

metadata.label: Secure Socket
metadata.description: Configurations related to SSL/TLS encryption

metadata.label: Auth
metadata.description: Authentication-related configurations for the `kafka:Producer`

metadata.label: Security Protocol
metadata.description: Type of the security protocol to use in the broker connection

metadata.label: Check Error
metadata.description: Terminate on error

metadata.label: Connection Scope
metadata.description: Scope of the connection, Global or Local

metadata.label: Connection Name
metadata.description: Name of the connection

metadata.label: Connection Type
metadata.description: Type of the variable
